alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 7:51PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alameda and northwestern Contra Costa Counties through 815 PM PST... At 751 PM PST, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Kensington, or over Berkeley, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 750 PM, the public reported small hail in the Berkeley Hills. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakland, Berkeley, Richmond, Walnut Creek, Lafayette, El Cerrito, Hercules, Albany, Pinole, Orinda, Rodeo, Kensington, El Sobrante, East Richmond Heigts, East Richmond Heights and Crockett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
